part 1

{% raw %} 
def read(f):
    return [(line[0], int(line[1:])) for line in open(f, 'r')]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
read("./data/12_test.txt")

[('F', 10), ('N', 3), ('F', 7), ('R', 90), ('F', 11)]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def p1(pos, ori, cmds):
    for (op, arg) in cmds:
        if op == 'N':
            pos += arg * (0 + 1j)
        elif op == 'S':
            pos += arg * (0 - 1j)
        elif op == 'E':
            pos += arg * (1 + 0j)
        elif op == 'W':
            pos += arg * (-1 + 0j)
        elif op == 'L':
            ori = (ori + arg) % 360
        elif op == 'R':
            ori = (ori - arg) % 360
        elif op == 'F':
            pos += arg * 1j**(ori // 90)
    return int(abs(pos.real) + abs(pos.imag))
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert p1(0 + 0j, 0, read("./data/12_test.txt")) == 25
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
p1(0 + 0j, 0, read("./data/12.txt"))

2847
{% endraw %}

part 2

{% raw %} 
def p2(pos, way, cmds):
    for (op, arg) in cmds:
        if op == 'N':
            way += arg * (0 + 1j)
        elif op == 'S':
            way += arg * (0 - 1j)
        elif op == 'E':
            way += arg * (1 + 0j)
        elif op == 'W':
            way += arg * (-1 + 0j)
        elif op == 'L':
            way *= 1j**(arg // 90)
        elif op == 'R':
            way *= 1j**(-arg // 90)
        elif op == 'F':
            pos += arg * way
    return int(abs(pos.real) + abs(pos.imag))
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert p2(0 + 0j, 10 + 1j, read("./data/12_test.txt")) == 286
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
p2(0 + 0j, 10 + 1j, read("./data/12.txt"))

29839
{% endraw %}
